title: Johns Hopkins Medicine
description: A comprehensive web-based tool streamlining clinical research management at Johns Hopkins Medicine, OnCore enhances communication among study teams, offers robust reporting capabilities, and ensures accurate billing for studies with prospective reimbursement analysis (PRA).

children.value: A comprehensive web-based tool streamlining clinical research management at Johns Hopkins Medicine, OnCore enhances communication among study teams, offers robust reporting capabilities, and ensures accurate billing for studies with prospective reimbursement analysis (PRA).
